sect2.title: Dependencies
sect2.para: Vim-&vim-depversion; needs the following to be installed:
sect2.literallayout: bash: sh binutils: ld, as diffutils: cmp, diff fileutils: chmod, cp, ln, mkdir, mv, rm, touch find: find gcc: cc grep: grep make: make net-tools: hostname sed: sed sh-utils: echo, expr, uname, whoami textutils: cat, tr, wc
